metadata.name: Shakti Tiger #1
metadata.description: Shakti (शकटी) originates from the Sanskrit word śakti, meaning 'power and divine energy.' The Shakti Tigers collection is XREX's genesis NFT series. It embodies the power and the energy that drives creation. For XREX, it symbolizes creating a social banking metaverse that supports our mission to redefine banking together. Inspired by the web3 spirit, Shakti Tigers symbolizes a collective effort empowering everyone with access to borderless financial services. It's a testament to you being a part of this financial inclusion movement, so welcome aboard! Shakti Tigers features artwork created by Taiwanese artists Via Chou (www.behance.net/viachou) and Paul Yeh (www.instagram.com/cvvc.conn/). It's a collection of 100 unique Shakti NFTs.
